title: Ariel Submission (SpectraMind V50)
description: Single-record JSON representation of a Kaggle submission row for the Ariel Data Challenge. Exactly one of `sample_id` (preferred) or legacy `id` must be present.

sample_id.description: Preferred ID field for a sample/row. Use alphanumerics, underscore or hyphen.

id.description: Legacy ID field for backward compatibility. Prefer `sample_id`.

mu.description: Mean transmission spectrum across 283 wavelength bins (mu_000 .. mu_282).

items.description: Mean transit depth for a single wavelength bin.

sigma.description: Uncertainty (std dev) per wavelength bin (sigma_000 .. sigma_282). Must be non-negative.

items.description: Non-negative standard deviation for a single wavelength bin.
